channel.title: After Hours with Alex Cooper
channel.description: Father Cooper herself, hosts a live after-hour session to give behind-the-scenes tea from the latest episodes of Call Her Daddy and chats with you the listeners to answer your burning questions â€” LIVE.

item.title: Premiere Alert! Father Cooper Goes Live
item.description: Your founding father makes her live room debut! Alex kicks things off with hot topics and life updates, followed by juicy pop culture hot takes, including celebrity couples "Bennifer" and "Kravis." Later she answers questions from listeners in the chat and gives some essential relationship advice.

item.title: Welcome to After Hours with Alex Cooper
item.description: Daddy Gang leader, Alex Cooper goes live to spill all the behind-the-scenes tea from her Call Her Daddy Podcast and answers listener's questions about life, love, and everything in between.
